etomica.virial

Class CalcFFT

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.virial.CalcFFT

  • public class CalcFFT
extends java.lang.Object
    CalcFFT can calculate distribution functions using FFT. Results are cached and reused if the component is needed again. Numerical results for components can also be taken from a file
